articles.description: England booked their place in the quarter-finals of Euro 2025 in style with a thumping victory over Wales - so are they ready to take the next step?
articles.title: England building 'urgency' at Euro 2025 - are they ready for Sweden?

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Chelsea vs PSG in the FIFA Club World Cup
articles.title: Chelsea vs PSG LIVE: Club World Cup final score, lineups, stats & updates

articles.description: 35 days after a devastating French Open final loss, Jannik Sinner is the Wimbledon champion. Here is how he did it.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Jannik Sinner bounces back from French Open heartbreak to win first title

articles.description: Increasing tension between England and India players sets up a thrilling final day of the third Test at Lord's, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: England vs India: Lord's classic awaits on day five after needle between two sides

articles.description: BBC Sport reflects on the pre-match, half-time and post-match entertainment at the Club World Cup final, as well as the heightened security at the MetLife Stadium.
articles.title: Trump, Coldplay & red carpets - was Club World Cup final more like Superbowl or soccer?

articles.description: Arsenal are close to finalising a deal with Sporting to sign Sweden forward Viktor Gyokeres.
articles.title: Viktor Gyokeres: Arsenal close to finalising deal with Sporting for Sweden forward

articles.description: American Chris Gotterup impressively holds off Rory McIlroy and the chasing pack to claim the biggest win of his career with a remarkable Scottish Open success.
articles.title: Scottish Open: Chris Gotterup holds off Rory McIlroy to win title

articles.description: Tributes have been paid to Diogo Jota and his brother Andre Silva ahead of Liverpool's first match since they died in a car crash.
articles.title: Diogo Jota: Liverpool pay tribute to forward in first match since his death

articles.description: Tim Merlier wins stage nine of the Tour de France in a sprint finish as Mathieu van der Poel's hopes of an audacious breakaway victory are dashed inside the final kilometre.
articles.title: Tour de France 2025 results: Merlier wins as Van der Poel denied on stage nine

articles.description: Delphine Cascarino stars as France score three goals in six second-half minutes to stun Netherlands and finish top of Group D at Euro 2025.
articles.title: Netherlands 2-5 France: France score three goals in six minutes to top Group D at Euro 2025
